modName: Ghorbash Class Counter-Fix to Unofficial Skyrim Patch USKP
summary: Version 1.2.4 of USKP changed Ghorbash the Iron Hand from CombatRanger to CombatWarrior1H. All the file does is simply to revert him back to the vanilla class.
descriptionHtml:
I consider the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url] an essential and indispensable mod. However, I was [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1433407-relzwipz-unofficial-skyrim-patch-thread-21/page__st__90__p__22026813#entry22026813]troubled[/url] by this particular tweak.

I owe this to Arthmoor! I wanted a favorite Xbox character, Grul gra-Dushnikh, to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557]Live Another Life[/url] on PC at Dushnikh Yal with her spouse Ghorbash. Now he can still be the Ranger at her back.
author: LotteryDiscountz
